first_para: Christopher (Chris) Williamson (born 16 September 1956) is a British Labour Party politician, who was elected as the Member of Parliament (MP) for Derby North in 2010. He was also a local councillor, representing the Normanton ward on Derby City Council until his resignation in 2011.

full.extract:
Christopher (Chris) Williamson (born 16 September 1956) is a British Labour Party politician, who was elected as the Member of Parliament (MP) for Derby North in 2010. He was also a local councillor, representing the Normanton ward on Derby City Council until his resignation in 2011.
^ "Who's Who". Ukwhoswho.com. Retrieved 2012-10-19. 
^ "DERBY North MP Chris Williamson has resigned from his position as councillor for Normanton after 20 years.". This is Derbyshire. 2011-03-26. Retrieved 2012-10-19.
full.title: Chris Williamson (politician)
